content.detailedDescription: I went out on the back steps to smoke it was around 1:30am i was looking up at the moon and from nowhere a bright white light circle appeared from nowhere flew in a straight line towards the east of it and the moon, then disappeared again it all happened in the matter of seconds i was amazed and felt cheated that i didnt get to see more! after it happened i ran back in the house to tell my husband, then went back outside to look for it again but i never saw anything else close to that. i fell asleep outside and around 6am my husband woke me up and then went back to sleep!
content.summary: Was looking up at moon to the right of the moon a bright white light appeared from nowhere flew in a line towards the east of it then disappeared again in 1 to 2 seconds it appeared then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Me and my sister observed the craft in front yard.We happen to look up on a clear moon night cause of a humming sound the craft was sitting right over us it had brilliant blue lights on corners very clear and vivid not fussy and it was bright but not where it hurt your eyes bright and had 3 dim whiteish lights under craft. we could see outline of the object it was a triangle and because of the clear bright night. we looked up at craft for at least 5min observing it and i guess it was observing us.As it stated to leave the humming stopped and was silent moving we took off inside to tell others to come look but as we went back outside it's was so faraway not sure how it done that so fast and then it disappeared i will always remember this it was life changing to see that. and i know aviation this was nothing we fly today
content.summary: Was over top of me a sister.Was life changing i still remember this

content.detailedDescription:
In the late evening of oct 1982 i and my girl friend were traveling north on illinois 51, returning from a movie date in carbondale, il heading home to nashville, il when nearing the town of de soto, il we both noticed what looked like car head lights hovering above the center of town, curious we stopped short of entering the town to observe what we were seeing, after a short time the object started to move heading south in our direction. 
being young and curious i opted to stay put and watch what we were seeing with my head out the window of the car as it passed within a stones throw distance overhead. 
my at the time girl friend was scared hitting me and telling me to take off and get out of there, me being suborn i stayed put instead to try and figure out what it was, puzzled i was not sure what i was seeing as it passed overhead, with the help of town lights i was able to see the bottom and part of the side of the object, it was a dull black triangular shaped craft about 30ft from each point width and length and had no propellers, landing gear, windows or any other feature of known air craft, the object was traveling south at less than 10 mph while over the town. 
as the object continued to travel south passing us parallel to route 51 just off the south bound lane, i continued watching and noticed the craft had what looked like a red tail light about a 1/4 the width across the back, it kept traveling south picking up speed as it reached the out skirts of town until it accelerated to unknown speed where i then lost site of it. 

both myself and at the time girlfriend were completely confused of what we seen, it was not a plane, helicopter, or any known craft of that era, we joked that we just seen a ufo and told friends what we seen later that night, which of course they didn't believe. but one friend noticed a day or so later that a similar object was reported in the local papers stating that it had been seen in illinois and mississippi on that same night.

i am older now and held onto the story of what we had seen for 34 years, i do not want any public attention from this report, i feel getting it out there might help tie my encounter to another from that location and time frame.
content.summary: 1982 triangular shaped craft hovering above town

content.detailedDescription: I woke up about 5:15 a.M. or around there and my bed is located by my window. so when i open my eyes i can see outside of my window. my cat was meowing, waking me up at the crack of dawn as he usually does. as i looked out the window i saw what looked to be a very bright star, it seemed so bright my first thought was is that a star or a planet? there was an oddity about it as it seemed to just glow staying in place. then it began to slowly drift up over my apartment and out of my view. i really thought it was star at first but the way it moved suddenly wasn't fast but a slow smooth motion. usually if it's a plane i would see a blinking light and it seemed too far to be a helicopter. i just had an odd feeling about it and the more i think about it today, the more i am sure i saw something unidentifiable.
content.summary: Awoke to seeing a glowing star like object that hovered for a few moments then slowly moved across the sky. no blinking lights, just glowing, with a slight twinkle like a star.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Everyday, i go out to take photos of the sun. today, i took around 25 photos around 1:00pm est. and they were one after the other.When i got finished,i went inside and downloaded them onto my computer.As i was going through each photo, i saw a photo which had the sun in it, and i noticed above the sun an object.I went to the photo before and after to see if the object was in any of those.The only photo i ave is one that has this unusual object. because of taking photos one right after the other, i have to assume that the object was flying fast and that i caught it on one photo. i blew the photo up to see if it was anything. i believe for the first time in my life, i caught a ufo.
content.summary: Photo taken and what i did'nt see until viewing photo

content.detailedDescription: Last night i was woken up by a loud vehicular sound coming from above my house, my husband who sleeps downstairs said he heard it too around the hour of 1 am, and immediately fell back asleep. when i woke up from the noise, i felt drugged. my vision was blurry, and i could only move very slow. standing by my bed was a creature. it looked very human but with much longer facial features and appendages, big dark eyes with long very curled eyelashes, and different looking skin. at first i was very scared and tried to call out, but suddenly became very calm and wasnt afraid at all. i fell asleep, and awoke laying on a table, in a paper gown, still feeling very drugged, in front of either a screen or window, in a room that smelled sterilized and looked very clean, where i was saw beautiful images of space and the universe. it was all very calm and felt very peaceful. i fell back asleep, and was awoken, by my husband when he came up to say goodbye before work, feeling like i did when i woke up from a surgery a few months ago. my left eye felt like it was vibrating, and my vision was shaking with the vibration, but its fine now. i just generally feel very nauseous and lightheaded now.
content.summary: Awoken by loud vehicular sound, and taken by humanoid figure

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and family (2 children) travellng around the belmopan ring road at 11 am to go to lunch spotted a "cloud" which was travelling quite fast changing through various colors above the american embassy complex and lady guadaloupe church which consequently changed direction and passed through a donut shaped hole through another cloud and carried on its direction. it looked like a "seahorse on its back" and moved with a fluttering/wobbelling movement  this was on a clear warm sunny day with blue sky and light clouds. i pursuaded my friend to let me submit this on her behalf, and i hope this is of some use.

.
content.summary: Cloud changes colour red/blue/gree/etc moving quickly punches donut type hole through another cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was playing cornhole in my front yard with my family, when i saw the ufo flying over the lake. when i first saw it from far away it sounded like a helicopter, so i assumed that it was a helicopter. once it got closer i realized it looked a lot different from a regular helicopter, and if i had to describe it, i would say it looks like a right triangular prism with boomerang wings on the top and was all white. it's movement was extremely peculiar because it looked like it was just moving forward but there was no source of push, as if it was hovering and moving forward at the same time. i loss sight of the object as it slowly hovered over the tree line and the sound slowly but surely disappeared. definitely was not a helicopter or plane.
content.summary: White triangle with wings, sounded like a helicopter, but definitely was not a helicopter

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the rooftop at the apartments of where i live.  i was outside talking to my mother-in-law, sister-in-law and wife.  i was just looking west to the city and noticed 3 or 4 lights hovering in the distance.  at first i thought the were helicopters because they were hovering.  i took my phone out and started recording, but then my battery died after about 30 seconds.

then when my family was going back to the apartment, i got up and took another look and watched them.  three main lights would appear to stay apart at the same distance.  when one light moved, the other would move as well.  but they would somehow stay in sink.  the three lights formed a triangle but kept it's distance from one another. 

it would hover and then all three would move together.I took out my 5mw green laser pointer and pointed at one of them for about 5 seconds.  then the one i pointed at because extremely bright for about 5 seconds.  i got excited and did it again.  but nothing happened the second time.

after a while all three lights faded out one at a a time in the sky.  they did not land or go anywhere, they just were in the exact same spot and winked out.
content.summary: The lights hovered for a long time in or near west philadelphia,  changed directions and then the light winkned out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving in a road between shiraz to bavanat. suddenly an oval shape material with sharp light comes close to me . i am afraid to talk about it cause the oval told me in farsi " ba az balayim " it means we are form the up(sky)...!
the oval told me that you should not talk to anyone ... but i couldnt see any man or human
content.summary: I shocked and i can not talk about it

content.detailedDescription: 1. having fun in the garden on a sunny day. 2. i simply noticed it gaining height diagonally. 3. i thought it was a large soap bubble. 4. it rose slowly and diagonally before moving away on a dead straight course due south at an unwaveringly constant height of 10 feet at a speed of 20 mph, at any rate too fast for me to consider running after it. 5. i asked "what is that?" instead of "what is that?" this struck me afterwards as symptomatic of my dumbfoundedness. my daughter and i gazed at it, shouting to my wife to come and look. she missed it. i was a little fearful. it was very close and very slow at fist and we got a very good long look at it. we had no camera back then. i dicussed everything--shape, size, colour, speed--with my daughter immediately afterwards so as not to forget. we knew it was something we could not explain. 6. it just carried on until it was too far away to see any more.I checked 'basketball' but it was without doubt between 6 and 8 inches in diameter.
content.summary: Perfectly spherical highly polished white mother-of-pearl opaque 7-inch diameter rose diagonally slowly very close then 20mph dead straight course south altitude 10 feet daughter (20+) saw too

content.detailedDescription: While driving home from the beach on i-640 wife was taking pictures of scenery ,this object appeared in one of the photos but we did not see it with naked eye
content.summary: Photo

content.detailedDescription: I was first looking out of my bedroom window before a strange, completely black and small object appeared in my view. at first i thought it was a bird but then i noticed that it was flying in a straight path and was completely black. i felt pretty weirded out while watching the object fly away from my view.
content.summary: Looking out of window, small, black object appears in sky, moves in straight line from the south to the east.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on back porch having cigarette.  saw light not far above the horizon and noted it didn't appear to be moving.  considered it might be a plane moving in straight line towards me.  watched for 20-30 seconds and it never seemed to actually get closer.  suddenly it darted in a diagonal direction either up and left or towards the nw.  it disappeared within a tenth of a second.
content.summary: Just before dawn, saw light to the north.  then it shot to the nw.

content.detailedDescription:
I were on a beach with ny daughter. we had a kite that was fling over my heads. the sky was brigth and completely clean (no coluds, airplanes, helicopters and son on).

it was in the late morning between 11:30 and 12:00 am. at a certain point, near the kite, i saw a black object in the sky. i think it was 4-5 chilometerer up in the sky. i kept observing the objiect because it was completely stationary. it did not move in any direction. the shape was not clearly visible, but it looked like a cylinder, sligtly inclined on its major axis. 

i looked at it about to minutes, when, then, something very strange happened.

the object emitted a bright light, as a flash, but not like a lightbulb when it is swithed on. the light started from one side of the object to go to the opponent side. after the flash, the object completely disappeared. i kept looking on the air for some minutes but i did not notice other phenomena.

no sound was produced by the object.
content.summary: It appeared as a black cilinder with a slight inclination. at a certain point it emitted a bright light an disappeared

content.detailedDescription: It's the morning of saturday 21st june 2014, i'm outside taking photos of a beautiful rainbow that is south-west and i'm standing on the verandah of the front side of the house i'm renting.  after taking 9 photos on my smartphone, i went back inside, downloaded the photos on my computer to look at later.  when the time came to look at the rainbow, i noticed in the first photo shot a 'black something' underneath the rainbow and in the photo taken two shots after shows the 'black something' in the top right hand of the photo.  there would have been four shots altogether, but the second shot had been a blurr and the third shot had been just blackness and both were deleted immediately.  it could be a ufo or a military aircraft, whatever it is, the times between the first shot and fourth shot were fast: first shot of 'black something' occurred at 7:37:10am and the second shot of 'black something' occurred at 7:37:46am, so it takes 'black something' 36 seconds to get from underneath the rainbow to the sky that is top right hand.  the first photo shows the 'black something' underneath the rainbow and it is like a round or half moon shape that has motion lines underneath it and it could be a cylandrical craft with a window with the motion lines being the pattern of the craft, then the second photo shows the 'black something' up in the sky, further west, back-on and like a trail is seen behind it, but just barely.  i felt excited to have shot my first ufo.
content.summary: 'black something' appeared underneath a rainbow

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my car next door to the neighbors (to house-sit while they're away for the weekend). i saw a bright yellow light formation (7-8 lights in total) in the sky, less than a block away. i pulled my car into their drive. i walked out into the middle of the road, i looked to the west, and looked up with extreme curiosity, and could not figure out what those lights were, and i could not believe how close they were to the ground, and how incredibly vivid and visible the lights were. - the configuration of the lights closely resembled the big or little dipper, except it was sitting right above the neighboring houses (and not far off into the galaxy).

i first thought they resembled some sort of work lights or stadium lights, except there was no down cast beam, in any way at all. and there are no commercial buildings or stadiums anywhere in the direction that i was looking. the immediate area of this sighting is mostly residential. these circular lights were very clearly defined (similar to a car headlight, except these lights had no beam in any direction, at all).

there were 5 lights which were the exact same size, and 2 just slightly smaller.

this light formation was incredibly bright, and stayed completely stationary. it didn't move at all for nearly 4-5 mins.

i kept my eyes fixed on these lights. i went through all rational guesses to figure out what these lights could be. a star constellation would not be this close to the ground. there are no commercial buildings, work sites, or stadiums in the direction i was facing to render these commercial lamps of any sort. and my 2 most rational guesses such as a group of drones, or any type of aircraft was completely ruled out because these lights were not moving in any direction at all. they didn't shake, dash or jaunt in any direction whatsoever. they were completely still, and much brighter than any star.

with complete amazement, i couldn't take my eyes off these lights, so i started to walk backwards, toward another neighbor's house across the street (intending to call this to their attention) and just as i was deciding whether to knock on their door, the 5 larger lights quickly went out, and seconds later, the 2 smaller lights gradually disappeared. this took place at approximately 9:20 pm, on thursday sept. 22, 2016, in batesville, in. - i was fully awake. i had no stimulants, drugs or alcohol in my system.

i have no explanation beyond what i've written, and can only say that it was actually rather special. very brief, and kinda magical. - i just wish there was someone else with me to have seen it. - i'm hoping maybe someone else in this area reports a similar finding. - it was so boldly visible, sitting right above our neighborhood. certainly someone else has to have seen this! 

i don't know if this is related, but ever so oddly, about 10 mins later, i saw 3 very young children (hardly older than 5-7 years old) racing down the sidewalk (in the dark), on razor scooters, in the same direction that i had seen these lights earlier. - maybe they saw them too, from a bit farther away, and were anxiously racing to discover more about these lights.

i drove around the neighborhood, and didn't see any other trace of the lights anywhere else.

i phoned 1 guy in my town, who's mother told me she saw ufos in this area some years ago, and that guy told me that he actually saw the same thing i did, last night (the night before i did), but he claims that the lights that he saw were multicolor.
content.summary: Aprox. 7-8 bright yellow lights, in a formation 'similar' to the big dipper (laid sideways) seemingly less than a football field off the ground. 5-6 lights on the lower/2 on top

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room on my phone when my parents called me down to the lounge and they said to hurry that's when they told me to look out the window. i saw a bright burnt orange light moving in a straight line across the sky. it was moving too fast too fast to be a plane and a helicopter and it only had one light when a plane  as a red or green flashing light. it lasted less than a minute until it went above the clouds.When looking at this i was really happy, my dad and i are really into this sort of stuff. this wasn't the first time my dad has spotted something like this.
content.summary: Constant glowing light traveling west to east direction then climbed through clouds and disapppered

content.detailedDescription: July 4th,2016 , while watching firewarks at alachua community center i noticed airplanes circling the immedate area as fire works were expolding in the air. i thought how would do that ! then i thought how it must look from those planes. when we got in the cars and were waitting in line to exit the parking feild the sky was heavy with  smoke from fireworks.I was in the back of the van lying down and noticed a small light gong slowly across the same feildit was very low and i thought it was a perdonal drone like the ones people fly around at public gatherings,such as the car races. then i saw another folling the first after obvervation i thought they were very sincronized.  several seconds later , i saw a third light trailling the two origional lights. i thought they must be towing a camera or something then i realized they have cameras on board already. the light i thought they were towing was not as bright. i didnot see it as a triangle. it dissapeared behind the trees. the sky was heavy with dark smoke from the fireworks . someone in the car said it was probably  drones. this sent my emotions from couriosoty to anger thinking our government was watching us cellabrate our liberity with invasive drones.Seconds later anouther craft was in site. this one was tilted with its belly towards us. i could see the perfect trianglation between the lights. this thing was hudge !  my property  at home is 500 ft long and it was all of that. it was below the tree tops !This parking area is in a bowl between hills so i could not see an approach. it hung in the air moving   ever so slowly.  i could not see if stars were blocked out nor could o see the color of the craft it was in the smoke but i could see it was darker than the srounding sky.The music was  playing and every one was happy ignoring my excitement.I was trying to get out of the car and the traffic suddenly started to go . there must have been around a thousabd people there  but i didnt see anyone else looking. i might not have seen it but i was laying down with the side door open .My companions did see parts of the first one but paid little attention to it. i dont know how long the firewarks lasted but i do know it  had to have taken us 15 to 20 mins to get home in the heavy traffic. i sit in the house about 10 miinutes thinking about what i had seen and wher i loooked at the clock it was only 9 15 . i would have thought it would have been around 10 15. i didnt loose time   i think i gained time. when i saw the second craft it dawned on me what it was there was no question in my mindweat i was seeing!It was just awsome! i would think others would have seen this.
content.summary: Two tringular shape craft  just over treetops moving dead slow 500 ft across

content.detailedDescription: July 4th,2016 , while watching firewarks at alachua community center i noticed airplanes circling the immedate area as fire works were expolding in the air. i thought how would do that ! then i thought how it must look from those planes. when we got in the cars and were waitting in line to exit the parking feild the sky was heavy with  smoke from fireworks.I was in the back of the van lying down and noticed a small light gong slowly across the same feildit was very low and i thought it was a perdonal drone like the ones people fly around at public gatherings,such as the car races. then i saw another folling the first after obvervation i thought they were very sincronized.  several seconds later , i saw a third light trailling the two origional lights. i thought they must be towing a camera or something then i realized they have cameras on board already. the light i thought they were towing was not as bright. i didnot see it as a triangle. it dissapeared behind the trees. the sky was heavy with dark smoke from the fireworks . someone in the car said it was probably  drones. this sent my emotions from couriosoty to anger thinking our government was watching us cellabrate our liberity with invasive drones.Seconds later anouther craft was in site. this one was tilted with its belly towards us. i could see the perfect trianglation between the lights. this thing was hudge !  my property  at home is 500 ft long and it was all of that. it was below the tree tops !This parking area is in a bowl between hills so i could not see an approach. it hung in the air moving   ever so slowly.  i could not see if stars were blocked out nor could o see the color of the craft it was in the smoke but i could see it was darker than the srounding sky.The music was  playing and every one was happy ignoring my excitement.I was trying to get out of the car and the traffic suddenly started to go . there must have been around a thousabd people there  but i didnt see anyone else looking. i might not have seen it but i was laying down with the side door open .My companions did see parts of the first one but paid little attention to it. i dont know how long the firewarks lasted but i do know it  had to have taken us 15 to 20 mins to get home in the heavy traffic. i sit in the house about 10 miinutes thinking about what i had seen and wher i loooked at the clock it was only 9 15 . i would have thought it would have been around 10 15. i didnt loose time   i think i gained time. when i saw the second craft it dawned on me what it was there was no question in my mindweat i was seeing!It was just awsome! i would think others would have seen this.
content.summary: Two tringular shape craft  just over treetops moving dead slow 500 ft across

content.detailedDescription:
I was out with my dog after hearing coyotes going nuts outside pretty close. looked up and saw 8-10 circular yellow lights darting very fast in all different directions but in a specific area of the sky and very low in altitude. there were no other colors other than glowing yellow. the lights darted back and forth in circular-like patterns and then all of a sudden disappeared and were replaced with one glowing light that appeared slowly dim to bright behind some clouds and then also disappeared. the darting circles then returned and i got freaked out and went back inside. like nothing i have ever seen before. i am a pretty skeptical person. 

not sure if this is related but as i sat and looked out my kitchen window moments after, the lights were gone, but i did hear a cow screaming quite loudly.
content.summary: 8-10 large circular lights close and darting in all directions then disappeared and one light glowed slowly, then the darting lights returned

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside finishing a cigarette and noticed a bright flash in my peripheral vision. i live under a flight path so i thought it was a plane. 
noticed the lights were brighter and lower than any other plane paths, also they were bright orange not white like the planes. i tried to get a closer look (still convinced it was a plane) but the light surrounding it was distorted and blurry, kind of like there was a lot of fog around the lights. 
this is going to sound crazy but it was almost like this thing was moving fast and bright in order to get my attention, then it slowed right down and changed once i realised this was not a plane or meteor. it changed colour to white and went from approx. sun-sized to large star-sized, before slowly pathing up and remaining there, hovering, and pulsing lights like it was dimming and relighting itself. 
then it started flashing different colours as well within the light itself. red and white mostly.

i didn't stick around to watch it for much longer as i didn't really want to see it take off or disappear. i spent about 10mins watching it and just paying attention.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange blurry/foggy bright light off a 'fireball', slowed down, turned white then hovered and flashed lights

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the yard with my dog.When i looked up in the sky and i saw a silver like disk object(a upside down bowl) in the sky.It flew from the north part of the sky and it just stopped mid air for like 5 minutes then it took off in a eastward direction.
content.summary: Silver disk like object high in the sky came to a stop then took off then gone

content.detailedDescription: On friday evening, i was giving my dog her evening walk and enjoying the clear sky when i noticed what i thought was a slow moving star. i stopped walking so that i could gauge whether the star was in fact moving, or just playing a optical trick on me. using another star as a reference, i observed the blue-whitish circular or orbicular light slowly move across the night sky away from my reference star. i have no clue how big or close the light was, as the only other objects in the sky were other stars, but it was definitely far enough away that it cast no light on the surrounding area or houses, and it made no audible sound. i observed the object move at a steady slow pace northeast before gradually fading as if it were on a dimmer, and eventually disappearing completely. i stuck around about twenty extra minutes waiting for something else to be seen but i did not observe anything else. i am not sure what i saw honestly.
content.summary: Star-like, blue white, circular or orbicular, steady moving in a straight line ne before gradually fading

content.detailedDescription: It started in 1974 long beach ca. they came my room though the wall i was 4yrs old at the time they took and show let me play in 0g . we move to the hudson valley in 1976 . saw a ufo that change shape . started to get taken told my parents no help they made worse told me it was a witch . in the 1980s i saw a big ufo over mohak mountian house . for the few yrs i wake at 3:30am with blodie nose .1987 i was taken that is when i saw the guy on the history chan and rember from the ship. 2014- 2016 many trips. i fell off my bike and landed on my ribs went to hosp told me ribs not broke went home did something flet them brake later i could not get air went black woke up at 3:30 core temp 69 think died ? and they save me for me need to talk to someone who bleave . this is my try do not let some call who dose not beleave  i wil know.  think i can get the prof that you need. by the a ufo crashed off the coast of fl  two or three they showed local new said it was a shoting stare .
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Contact

content.detailedDescription: I was doing laundry and saw some lights out of the corner of my eye outside, flashing like an emergency vehicle. i went to the window (1st floor) and saw an object go by at about the 3rd - 4th floor level. it seemed to be rolling with lights rotating around its axis, not its equator. all the lights were white. it rolled down 11th ave and out of sight over a park. the lights were bright enough to reflect off the buildings across the street - very bright. no sound, emissions, or other features that i noticed - i simply did not have time to observe it for very long before i was out of sight.
content.summary: Rolling lighted object in denver

content.detailedDescription:
It is between 4:45-4:55 on the day of september 22nd, 2016. i am in litchfield, nh heading towards mel's funway park from the direction of the airport. i just passed corning rd., and something caught my eye. i glanced slightly upwards, and didn't noice anything out of place. i hadn't been completely focused on whatever i thought caught my eye and just assumed there was nothing there. the moment that i did so, was when the lights began. now i definitely knew there was something strange going on. i looked up and saw a large almost blindingly bright irregular orb. it mainly consist of the color white but you could see all of the others colors flashing through it quickly as well. it hovered like this for a minute and then suddenly zoomed off in the other direction of me. it went from large and glowing, to minuscule, and then out of my sight in less than 10 seconds. i was almost in a trance while i was looking at it. i felt immense relief and and gratitude during and after this. my first thought brought tears to my eyes, and simply was "they didn't leave me." i got a strange feeling of an intense emotional connection with something, it didn't feel like a new experience even though i cannot recall ever seeing anything like this in the past. 

whatever it was, i will view it as i feel it. i'm thankful to know we are not alone, and that when its time for me to return, they will be there and ready for me. i just have to be ready first. i don't know why i know this but i can feel it straight to my core.
content.summary: It was a large glowing multicolor sphere. the colors constantly were alternating. it got slightly closer and much brighter, and then became smaller and flew away incredibly fast.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of september 19th between the hours of 9-11pm several people were awakened in at least a 3 county radius by at least three military fighter jets and what appeared to some to be a large unidentified flying object.  
a local news station got wind of the events and posted on their facebook page for anyone who might have information on what had happened.  several interesting posts were made, some even provided video.  alot of the posts have been removed from the page already and it has only been a matter of days since the incident.  
while this was not a first hand account of what happened i felt the need to come here because i feel someone needs to look into this further.
content.summary: Fighter jets flying at very low altitudes at night. has never happened before.  local news station inquired via facebook.  interesting responses.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I can't really place the exact time and year of the event but it was maybe 5 to 7 years ago in oshawa, ont. i had been meditating and deeply absorbed in the ufo topic at that point in my life and one the popular theories i had read was that many of these beings were telepathic and kind. so naturally i thought i could try and make contact if i broadcasted my intent loud enough. for some reason at the time it was something i really felt that i needed,  was that confirmation of these accounts of ufos and telepathic exchange.

i went outside and began to meditate under a roof with a sunlight in my family's backyard. it was a clear spring / summer day with not a cloud in the sky. i was meditating to ask for contact or proof. i slipped into a deep state and awoke from it staring up through the skylight. i thought i saw seaguls flying over but then something came over me and i thought one of those shapes didn't have any wings. i got up and rushed out from under the roof and looked straight up and this silvery-white object quickly in a straight path and as if to prove it wasn't a bird it did a quick maneuver where it darted left really fast, and then again to the right and kept moving far away until within a couple seconds it was so far and out of site. it looked like it was way up there in the sky but low enough to see. 

i couldn't believe it, not about what happened but that they would take the time to humor me. i believe since then i have had a few more sightings. because i can't validate the details of the other interesting experience i will quickly state the facts. i was with my girlfriend at the time in the park at night. we were looking at the stars and realized one that looked big and bright like a planet disappeared then again re-appeared somewhere else in the sky or there multiple lights. they were stationary. 

as well, given the circumstances of my first experience i had more meditations with the intent of contact. i would awake to immediately see a "shooting star" above me. once i was i was feeling quite emotional laying on the ground in toronto and remarked how the skies had so much light pollution we could never see any ufos if there were any. within a few seconds of that statement a shooting star passed right over. "ha ha very funny, that's not the point space-guys"

anyways i have come to believe there are interesting correlations between shooting stars and the intent to make contact.

ufos and telepathy all in one. i have had a couple other experiences mostly internal that i will keep to myself.
content.summary: Ufo buzzed over, potential contact / flyby

content.detailedDescription: First i saw an entity it watched me for many hours it never ever spoke it just looked at me i was to scared to get to close so i just talked to it on and off for many hours the next day is when we started seeing things in the clouds the actual clouds were the ships some as large as small cities and they were either black gray or white some were shaped like pyramids some were round and there wete so many and we kept seeing such things for two weeks then the entity showed up again in the same spit it had been two weeks earlier i contacted many sites about this encounyer and nobody ever helps. its kinda messed up because i did get a hold of someone but he said he couldnt talk to me until i made a report he sounded excited and nervouse at the same time but then hung up on me a couple days later everything in our lives changed we started being followed and watched 24/7 and your probably not geting this cause the government has a way of blocking what goes out on my phone wish you could help but no one can
content.summary: Looked like clouds at first then all different shapes appearwd some as large as 10 football fields mostly pyramid shaped
